extensionDescription.message: Adds a context submenu to tag quotes, images, and links for as BB Code to be pasted into forum posts.

menuItemMultiMode.description: Title of context menu item that toggles multiple tags when clicked.

menuItemQuote.description: Title of context menu item that tags the selected text when clicked.

menuItemImageFull.description: Title of context menu item that tags both the image and its link (if any) when clicked.

menuItemImage.description: Title of context menu item that tags an image when clicked.

menuItemLink.description: Title of context menu item that tags a link when clicked.

menuClearClipboard.description: Title of context menu item that clears the clipboard when clicked.

errorNoSelection.description: Error message when there is no selected text.

errorNoImage.description: Error message when there is no image.

errorNoLink.description: Error message when there is no image.
